sentences.en: After her shoplifting spree she lived in mortal dread of being found out.
sentences.cn: 在商店连番行窃之后,她惶恐终日,害怕给人发现.

sentences.en: After the rescue, profits returned and Citi went on a buying spree.
sentences.cn: 在获救之后, 利润有所回升,花旗展开了毫无节制的收购行动.

sentences.en: He went on a drinking spree.
I got a few years for my crime spree.
sentences.cn: 由于暴力犯罪,我被判入狱几年.

sentences.en: I'm surprised that they didn't treat you to the story of that little spree. "
sentences.cn: 我真奇怪人家没给你讲过那次小胡闹的故事. ”

sentences.en: In response , the RBI has been on a rate - hike spree since January.
sentences.cn: 面对这一情况,RBI自一月以来就一直疯狂加息.

sentences.en: Is this just another crime spree , or the work of one deranged maniac?
sentences.cn: 这只是一桩普通命案还是什么杀人狂的杰作?

sentences.en: It was a glorious spree for the gang which had Georgia by the throat.
sentences.cn: 对于那帮骑着佐治亚脖子的人来说,这是一件值得庆祝的大喜事.

sentences.en: My mother went on a shopping spree at the mall.
sentences.cn: 我的母亲到购物中心疯狂大采购.

sentences.en: Old Sebastian's on the spree again.
sentences.cn: 老塞巴斯蒂安又狂欢了.

sentences.en: So why don't you go on a shopping spree on her?
sentences.cn: 所以你有什么理由不好好来个狂欢血拼 呢 ?

sentences.en: Ten gallons of wash , i can go on a spree.
sentences.cn: 十加仑能让我痛饮一番.

sentences.en: The risks lie in the effectiveness and efficiency of a spending spree.
sentences.cn: 风险在于这种挥霍的效力与效率.

sentences.en: They went on the spree and spent a lot of money.
sentences.cn: 他们大吃大喝,花了一大笔钱.

sentences.en: We are having a spree tonight.
sentences.cn: 今晚我们准备痛痛快快地乐一乐.

trans.tran_cn: 欢闹，狂欢，无节制的狂热行为
trans.tran_en: a short period of time when you do a lot of one activity, especially spending money or drinking alcohol
